pages.title: Redstone Terminal
pages.text: Overview $(br2)Most Control Craft blocks have redstone panels. This terminal assigns Create-compatible wireless redstone channels to each panel item (force, target, lock, etc.).

pages.title: Example Layout
pages.text: Typical layout for a Physical Piston.

Each row corresponds to a redstone panel item. Settings mirror the block's internal panel.$(br2)For toggle items (e.g., is_locked), the red switch toggles a built-in NOT gate to invert input signals.$(br2)The rightmost column toggles channel visibility.
Channels of the same type are grouped. Multiple active channels use the block's defined aggregation logic (summation or exclusivity).
